about_the_game:
• Game Overview

"Memory Island" is a single-player 2D pixel RPG action game. In the game, you will play an ordinary person who accidentally lost his memory during an adventure and came to "Memory Island". On the way to regain your memory, you will face powerful enemies, solve puzzles in the map, understand the people and things on the island, and experience wonderful stories. Gradually unravel the truth of your identity and the origin of "Memory Island" during the journey.

• Worldview Introduction

This is a mysterious, fantasy, and puzzle-filled island. But it seems to have the ability to turn memory into reality? and you can feel that you have some strange connection with it, which allows you to obtain the enemy's memory and have the ability to use their moves and skills to protect yourself. Master these various abilities and find a suitable and powerful combination, face dangerous and powerful enemies, protect the people and things you want to protect, establish your own bond with Memory Island, and create your own adventure!

• Gameplay Introduction

"Memory Island" is a 2D pixel-style RPG game. Refining potions, strengthening weapons, acquiring skills, and matching charms are the core of "Memory Island". Secondly, the important goal of "Memory Island" is to tell a rich story as much as possible, so that players can have many different emotional experiences in one game.

• Development Background

"Memory Island" is a game created by me buying resources from various resources websites and sitting alone in front of the computer. The game will be updated after it is released. I am trying my best to do every link well, but my energy is very limited. I hope you can get the game experience you want after purchasing it, and leave your valuable suggestions. All your suggestions are acceptable.
